replies.text: Would you like me to check you out now?

replies.text: Sorry I didn't get that. Would you like me to check you out?

replies.text: Ok! I've checked you out. There is a box in the lobby where you can drop off your keys.

replies.text: Thank you for staying with us!

replies.text: It seems like you don't want to check out. Is there something else I can help you with?
